attributes.action: Replace not banning someone with 12 points with a "Suspended" driving ban.
attributes.additional_details: BBC Report under the freedom of information dated 23rd Feb 2017. Introducing a "Suspended" driving ban under hardship cases should encourage defendants to abide by the law.
attributes.background: Current press reports identified someone with 62 points on their licence and still allowed to drive is not fair on law abiding citizens using the "Hardship" option.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly how you would like a "suspended" driving ban to work. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
